data: June | London | Bandolero Restaurant | Shaftesbury Avenue

In a day in June, at the hour when London moves abroad in quest of lunch, a young man stood at the entrance of the Bandolero Restaurant looking earnestly up Shaftesbury Avenueâ€”a large young man in excellent condition, with a pleasant, good-humoured, brown, clean-cut face.
